summary: This is a US Attorney's Office email request for prisoner production for court, specifically for Jeffrey Epstein's hearing on July 15, 2019, before Judge Berman in the Southern District of New York. It indicates a 'Fatico hearing' is scheduled, which is a proceeding to resolve disputed facts relevant to sentencing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The prisoner being requested for production for a Fatico hearing in case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB). He is identified by his inmate number 76318-054.

persons.name: Berman
persons.context: The judge before whom the hearing is scheduled to take place in courtroom 1713.

events.title: Fatico Hearing for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A court hearing scheduled for Jeffrey Epstein at 9:30 am before Judge Berman. The production request specifies it is a 'Fatico hearing', which is held to resolve factual disputes relevant to sentencing.

locations: Southern District of New York, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A Fatico hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for July 15, 2019, at 9:30 am before Judge Berman.
The document is a formal prisoner production request from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Jeffrey Epstein was held under inmate number 76318-054 at the time of the request.
The case number is 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), indicating it is a 2019 criminal case.
